headline: Broadridge and Xceptor Partner to Transform Global Tax Reclaims and Asset Servicing Operations
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR), a global Fintech leader, today announced a strategic partnership with Xceptor, a global leader in data automation for financial institutions, to offer a unified digital platform automating the global tax relief and tax reclaim lifecycle.
